Not covered as part of standard Installation charges are: 1) Outdoor unit stand - Rs. 750-1000. 2) Extra copper wire - Rs. 600-800 per metre (Two sized copper pipes will be used) 3) Drain pipe extension- Rs. 80- 110 per metre. 4) Wiring extension from the meter to the installation site - Rs. 90 per metre. 5) Vinyl tape roll -Rs. 80-110 6) Dismantling/shifting of the old AC's - Rs. 700-800 7) Closing the holes with White Cement - on Actuals 8) Stabilizer 9) Plumbing and masonry work 10) Power-point/MCB fitting and any other electrical work 11) Carpentry work. 12) Core cutting fabrication and electrical. product_description: With the Blue Star 1.2 Ton Split Inverter AC, you can enjoy pleasant and cool weather even in the hottest summer months. This air conditioner's pre-set mode is thoughtfully engineered to deliver a pleasant temperature throughout the day. This air conditioner's energy-efficient design not only provides excellent performance but also reduces excessive power usage. Furthermore, the Anti-corrosive Blue Fins used by this AC improve the appliance's longevity by preventing corrosion. Additionally, this air conditioner is made with copper tubing, which offers a nice breeze and excellent performance. Moreover, this AC comes ready to be operated with Blue Star Smart application that enables you to operate it through your voice with the aid of Alexa and Google Home.

Moreover, thanks to the corrosion-resistant blue fin technology, you can enjoy an enduring performance and improved cooling performance on this AC.

product_description: Keep your space filled with cool air and enjoy better air quality with the Lloyd Window Air Conditioner. With the help of a self-diagnosis function, the chips in this air conditioner detect issues that can hinder its performance and indicate it on the LED screen. These chips also start the protect function for safety. And, when electricity resumes after an outage, the auto-restart feature starts this AC’s operations according to the previously used setting. Moreover, the advanced air filter in this air conditioner ensures that the air you breathe is of good quality.

Apart from enhancing your room’s aesthetic appeal with its sleek design, this AC also enables convenient use, courtesy of the MirAIe app. You can use the MirAIe app to instruct this AC via Google Assistant, pre-set your preferred temperature for the night, or adjust the appliance’s cooling performance from a distance with ease. Additionally, this AC’s Shield Blu feature and 100% copper coil extend its lifespan and allow it to serve you for a long time.

This air conditioner’s good sleep feature allows you to sleep like a baby by adjusting the temperature of the room according to the weather outside. This air conditioner is an eco-friendly appliance that allows you to do your bit against global climate change while also enabling you to enjoy the cool breeze.

product_details.Installation Details:
The standard installation charges are Rs.1599 and need to be paid directly to the service engineer. Please check the offer details to know about any installation offers that are available. 
 Standard installation of air-conditioners covers only: 
 1) Drilling of holes into a brick wall for taking out the pipes. 
 2) Fixing a hole sleeve & cap. 
 3) Fixing the indoor and outdoor unit. 
 4) Connecting indoor and outdoor units using the standard Kit provided by the manufacturer (at additional cost,unless specified otherwise). 
 5) Wrapping the pipe with seasoning tape.

product_description: The Samsung Split Inverter air conditioner, particularly constructed air conditioner with a long lifespan and high efficiency. The heat exchanger is guarded against rusting by an anti-corrosive barrier. Thanks to its triple-shield protection, the air conditioner is insulated against voltage spikes. The good sleep functionality of this air conditioner lets you sleep peacefully by controlling the interior temperature as per the weather outside. This air conditioner is an eco-sustainable appliance that allows you to play a part in anthropogenic climate change while still enjoying a refreshing airflow.

product_description: You can keep your indoors cool with the Lloyd 1.2 ton Split Inverter Air Conditioner. Equipped with a PM 2.5 filter, this air conditioner can effectively eliminate even tiny pollutants from the air to ensure clean and improved indoor air quality. Thanks to its wide operating range from -10°C to 52°C, this AC lets you effortlessly adjust the temperature as per your requirements. Moreover, with its stabiliser-free operation, this air conditioner is safeguarded against voltage fluctuations for high comfort, energy savings, and utmost safety.

product_description: You can beat the summer heat with the help of the Carrier Ester CXI Split Inverter Air Conditioner. Its Flexicool Inverter technology regulates cooling performance while also altering power usage via four different tonnage modes. Additionally, this air conditioner provides speedy cooling performance, thanks to its Turbo Cool Mode. It speeds up the fan RPM, delivering fast and effective cooling. Moreover, this air conditioner's PM 2.5 filter and HD filter removes PM 2.5 as well as other pollution particles from the indoor air, making it clean and hygienic.

product_details.Installation Details:
The standard installation charges are Rs. 750. 
Standard installation of air-conditioners covers only: 
1) The installation will be done using only the items that are available inside the box. 
2) Install the AC in the pre-cut grill or a wall-space. 
3) Connection to a stabilizer or a power-point in the range of the power cord provided by the manufacturer. 
4) A test run to check the AC's cooling performance. 
5) A product demonstration. 
Not covered as part of standard installation charges are: 
1) Wiring extension from the meter to the installation site - Rs. 100 per metre. 
2) Power-point/MCB fitting and any other electrical work. 
3) Welding/grill-cutting work. 
4) A wooden frame, if required. 
5) Carpentry work, in case the window size needs to be altered. 
6) Drain pipe extension. - Rs. 100 per metre. 
7) Plumbing and masonry work. 
8) Dismantling/shifting of the old AC. - Rs. 1000-1500.

product_details.Installation Details: Standard installation of air-conditioners upto covers only: 1) Drilling of holes into a brick wall for taking out the pipes 2) Fixing a hole sleeve & Cap. 3) Fixing & Connecting indoor and outdoor units using the standard Kit provided by the manufacturer. Not covered as part of standard Installation charges are: 1) Outdoor unit stand - Rs. 750-1000. 2) Extra copper wire - Rs. 600-800 per metre (Two sized copper pipes will be used) 3) Drain pipe extension- Rs. 80- 110 per metre. 4) Wiring extension from the meter to the installation site - Rs. 90 per metre. 5) Vinyl tape roll -Rs. 80-110 6) Dismantling/shifting of the old AC's - Rs. 700-800 7) Closing the holes with White Cement - on Actuals 8) Stabilizer 9) Plumbing and masonry work 10) Power-point/MCB fitting and any other electrical work 11) Carpentry work. 12) Core cutting fabrication and electrical. Note: we highly recommend to use standard & authorized accessories Only. In case customer arranges accessories by his own, Brand Service Engineer might refuse &/or ask for labour charges for fixing these accessories.

product_details.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty does not Cover Plastic Parts. If Any Mishandling from Customer on AC, Fire Accident to AC if Fire Source is External, Natural Calamity, Tampered Parts will Not be Covered under Warranty.

product_description: Summers at home will no longer be humid and hot when you install the LG AI Dual Inverter ThinQ Wi-Fi Split Air Conditioner. Its variable tonnage technology and Artificial Intelligence make it a smart air conditioner. Also, its AI Dual inverter predicts the apt cooling capacity and senses the indoor surrounding conditions to control the vane position, fan speed, and temperature settings so that you enjoy comfortable cooling. Moreover, this AC’s AI Convertible six-in-one cooling feature lets you effortlessly enhance and lower the cooling as per the requirement.

product_description: Stay comfortable even during extreme weather conditions with the Lloyd Split Inverter Air Conditioner. Thanks to its Air Cooled Electric Control Box Technology, this AC effectively cools down its inside parts in the external unit even when the temperature outdoors is as high as 52°C. Moreover, its four-way swing directs the air through vertical and horizontal louvres, ensuring uniform air cooling across your space.

product_details.Installation Details:
The standard installation charges are Rs. 750. 
Standard installation of air-conditioners covers only: 
1) The installation will be done using only the items that are available inside the box. 
2) Install the AC in the pre-cut grill or a wall-space. 
3) Connection to a stabilizer or a power-point in the range of the power cord provided by the manufacturer. 
4) A test run to check the AC's cooling performance. 
5) A product demonstration. 
Not covered as part of standard installation charges are: 
1) Wiring extension from the meter to the installation site - Rs. 100 per metre. 
2) Power-point/MCB fitting and any other electrical work. 
3) Welding/grill-cutting work. 
4) A wooden frame, if required. 
5) Carpentry work, in case the window size needs to be altered. 
6) Drain pipe extension. - Rs. 100 per metre. 
7) Plumbing and masonry work. 
8) Dismantling/shifting of the old AC. - Rs. 1000-1500.

It is equipped with a PM 2.5 filter that effectively collects particles up to 2.5 microns in the air, delivering a clean and hygienic indoor environment. So, you can easily self-diagnose the issue and report it to a Daikin authorised service centre for prompt repair.

Also, you can clean the AC effortlessly thanks to the easy clean filter, which has a dense mesh to protect against the antigens.

product_description: Featuring Air Cooled Electric Control Box Technology, the Lloyd air conditioner quickly brings down the temperature of the outdoor unit and its internal parts. This provides cooling even when the ambient temperature is 48°C. And, this air conditioner's large indoor unit and wide outlet allow the air to reach all the corners of your room. Furthermore, featuring two-way swing action, this air conditioner opens up the air vane in the counterclockwise direction to channel the airflow horizontally towards you.

Standard installation of air-conditioners covers only:

2) Fixing a hole sleeve & cap. 
3) Fixing the indoor and outdoor unit. 
4) Connecting indoor and outdoor units using the standard Kit provided by the manufacturer (at additional cost,unless specified otherwise).

product_details.Installation Details:
The standard installation charges are Rs. 1599 and need to be paid directly to the service engineer. Please check the offer details to know about any installation offers that are available.
Standard installation of air-conditioners covers only:
1) Drilling of holes into a brick wall for taking out the pipes.
2) Fixing a hole sleeve & cap.
3) Fixing the indoor and outdoor unit.
4) Connecting indoor and outdoor units using the standard Kit provided by the manufacturer (at additional cost, unless specified otherwise).
5) Wrapping the pipe with seasoning tape.
Not covered as part of standard Installation charges are:
1) Outdoor unit stand - Rs. 750-1000.
2) Extra copper wire - Rs. 600-800 per metre.
3) Drain pipe extension, if any - Rs. 100 per metre.
4) Wiring extension from the meter to the installation site - Rs. 100 per metre.
5) Stabilizer, if needed, is chargeable.
6) Plumbing and masonry work.
7) Power-point/MCB fitting and any other electrical work.
8) Carpentry work.
9) Dismantling/shifting of the old AC's masonry - Rs. 1000-1500.
10) Core cutting fabrication and electrical.

product_details.Installation Details: Standard installation of air-conditioners upto covers only: 1) Drilling of holes into a brick wall for taking out the pipes 2) Fixing a hole sleeve & Cap. 3) Fixing & Connecting indoor and outdoor units using the standard Kit provided by the manufacturer. Not covered as part of standard Installation charges are: 1) Outdoor unit stand - Rs. 750-1000. 2) Extra copper wire - Rs. 600-800 per metre (Two sized copper pipes will be used) 3) Drain pipe extension- Rs. 80- 110 per metre. 4) Wiring extension from the meter to the installation site - Rs. 90 per metre. 5) Vinyl tape roll -Rs. 80-110 6) Dismantling/shifting of the old AC's - Rs. 700-800 7) Closing the holes with White Cement - on Actuals 8) Stabilizer 9) Plumbing and masonry work 10) Power-point/MCB fitting and any other electrical work 11) Carpentry work. 12) Core cutting fabrication and electrical. Note: we highly recommend to use standard & authorized accessories Only. In case customer arranges accessories by his own, Brand Service Engineer might refuse &/or ask for labour charges for fixing these accessories.

product_description: With the Onida 1 Ton Flexi 5 Inverter AC, you can eradicate summer's roughness and blistering heat. For improved cooling performance, while keeping your AC safe from rust and corrosion, this air conditioner has pure copper coils with a blue fin coating. This air conditioner has 5 pleasant cooling settings that may be adjusted to provide the best cooling possible for you. You can take advantage of optimal cooling throughout your room thanks to the I-feel technology.

product_details.Installation Details:
The standard installation charges are Rs.1599 and need to be paid directly to the service engineer. Please check the offer details to know about any installation offers that are available. 
Standard installation of air-conditioners covers only: 
1) Drilling of holes into a brick wall for taking out the pipes. 
2) Fixing a hole sleeve & cap. 
3) Fixing the indoor and outdoor unit. 
4) Connecting indoor and outdoor units using the standard Kit provided by the manufacturer (at additional cost,unless specified otherwise). 
5) Wrapping the pipe with seasoning tape. 
Not covered as part of standard Installation charges are: 
1) Outdoor unit stand - Rs. 750-1000. 
2) Extra copper wire - Rs. 600-800 per metre. 
3) Drain pipe extension,if any - Rs. 100 per metre. 
4) Wiring extension from the meter to the installation site - Rs. 100 per metre. 
5) Stabilizer,if needed,is chargeable. 
6) Plumbing and masonry work. 
7) Power-point, MCB fitting and any other electrical work. 
8) Carpentry work. 
9) Dismantling, shifting of the old AC's masonry - Rs. 1000-1500. 
10) Core cutting fabrication and electrical.

product_details.Installation Details: Standard installation of air-conditioners upto covers only: 1) Drilling of holes into a brick wall for taking out the pipes 2) Fixing a hole sleeve & Cap. 3) Fixing & Connecting indoor and outdoor units using the standard Kit provided by the manufacturer. Not covered as part of standard Installation charges are: 1) Outdoor unit stand - Rs. 750-1000. 2) Extra copper wire - Rs. 600-800 per metre (Two sized copper pipes will be used) 3) Drain pipe extension- Rs. 80- 110 per metre. 4) Wiring extension from the meter to the installation site - Rs. 90 per metre. 5) Vinyl tape roll -Rs. 80-110 6) Dismantling/shifting of the old AC's - Rs. 700-800 7) Closing the holes with White Cement - on Actuals 8) Stabilizer 9) Plumbing and masonry work 10) Power-point/MCB fitting and any other electrical work 11) Carpentry work. 12) Core cutting fabrication and electrical. Note: we highly recommend to use standard & authorized accessories Only. In case customer arranges accessories by his own, Brand Service Engineer might refuse &/or ask for labour charges for fixing these accessories.

product_description: Enjoy a cool, refreshing environment at home with the LG Dual Inverter Split Air Conditioner. Leveraging artificial intelligence and variable tonnage technology, it can accurately detect the room's temperature to forecast the right cooling capacity and alter the fan speed, temperature, and vane position. Furthermore, this air conditioner has in-built sensors and artificial intelligence convertible modes to analyse the current conditions to ensure optimal cooling. And, owing to its horizontal and vertical swing movement, this AC offers consistent cooling across the space.

product_description: Hot summers will not be a problem anymore, as you bring home the LG Dual Cool Inverter Air Conditioner. This AC is equipped with the Varied Speed Dual-rotary compressor that offers a wide rotational frequency to save energy consumption and increase the cooling speed. As a result, you can enjoy fast cooling and long-running AC. Also, the device comes with a 5-in-1 convertible cooling system so that you can manage the level of cooling according to your needs. And, this AC features voice control and a WI-FI enabled system so that you can control the AC using apps like Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa. Finally, thanks to the Ocean Black Fin feature, you can enjoy the long term protection of your AC from dust, smoke, and chemicals.

The powerful mode of this AC ensures a strong airflow for fast cooling performance, and the PM 2.5 Filter removes minute pollutants to deliver clean and purified air. Equipped with an eco-friendly refrigerant, this AC helps to lower your carbon footprint while being energy-efficient.

product_description: If you are interested in an air conditioner that can cool your summer days with ease, look no further than the Blue Star 1.5 Ton Split Inverter AC. This air conditioner is equipped with a Brushless DC motor that works on an electronic commutation arrangement that improves its reliability and reduces operation noise at high rotational speeds. Furthermore, this air conditioner is fitted with anti-corrosive Blue Fins that protects it from corrosion and enables optimum heat transfer for improved efficiency and longevity.

product_details.Installation Details:
The standard installation charges are Rs.1599 and need to be paid directly to the service engineer. Please check the offer details to know about any installation offers that are available. 
Standard installation of air-conditioners covers only: 
1) Drilling of holes into a brick wall for taking out the pipes. 
2) Fixing a hole sleeve & cap. 
3) Fixing the indoor and outdoor unit. 
4) Connecting indoor and outdoor units using the standard Kit provided by the manufacturer (at additional cost,unless specified otherwise). 
5) Wrapping the pipe with seasoning tape. 
Not covered as part of standard Installation charges are: 
1) Outdoor unit stand - Rs. 750-1000. 
2) Extra copper wire - Rs. 600-800 per metre. 
3) Drain pipe extension,if any - Rs. 100 per metre. 
4) Wiring extension from the meter to the installation site - Rs. 100 per metre. 
5) Stabilizer,if needed,is chargeable. 
6) Plumbing and masonry work. 
7) Power-point, MCB fitting and any other electrical work. 
8) Carpentry work. 
9) Dismantling, shifting of the old AC's masonry - Rs. 1000-1500. 
10) Core cutting fabrication and electrical.

The standard installation charges are Rs.1599 and need to be paid directly to the service engineer. Please check the offer details to know about any installation offers that are available. 
Standard installation of air-conditioners covers only: 
1) Drilling of holes into a brick wall for taking out the pipes. 
2) Fixing a hole sleeve & cap. 
3) Fixing the indoor and outdoor unit. 
4) Connecting indoor and outdoor units using the standard Kit provided by the manufacturer (at additional cost,unless specified otherwise). 
5) Wrapping the pipe with seasoning tape. 
Not covered as part of standard Installation charges are: 
1) Outdoor unit stand - Rs. 750-1000. 
2) Extra copper wire - Rs. 600-800 per metre. 
3) Drain pipe extension,if any - Rs. 100 per metre. 
4) Wiring extension from the meter to the installation site - Rs. 100 per metre. 
5) Stabilizer,if needed,is chargeable. 
6) Plumbing and masonry work. 
7) Power-point, MCB fitting and any other electrical work. 
8) Carpentry work. 
9) Dismantling, shifting of the old AC's masonry - Rs. 1000-1500. 
10) Core cutting fabrication and electrical.

product_description: Even when the ambient temperature is high, the Daikin 1.5 Ton Split Inverter Air Conditioner provides excellent cooling performance. And, this air conditioner uses Daikin's inverter technology to offer a wide range of compressor frequencies, which helps it deliver efficient performance. Furthermore, you can keep an eye on its operation, thanks to the triple display feature. It allows you to track energy efficiency based on the anticipated power consumption percentage of your AC in real-time, as well as the set temperature or room temperature and error code.

product_name: Daikin 1 Ton 3 Star Split Inverter with PM 2.5 Filter AC with PM 2.5 Filter  - White  (ATKL35TV16WC, Copper Condenser)

product_description: You can easily feel the relief from the sweltering summers with the Daikin 1.5 Ton Split Inverter Air Conditioner. With Daikin’s inverter technology, this air conditioner features a variety of compressor frequencies to offer enhanced cooling performance. Integrated with one-button Dew Clean technology, this air conditioner utilises condensate water to effectively and automatically clean the evaporator coil of the heat exchanger in the indoor unit. Moreover, thanks to its PM 2.5 filter, this air conditioner can effectively collect small air particles that are up to 2.5 microns in size to offer clean indoor air.

The Coanda airflow feature provides a comfortable ambience and a fine air-conditioning experience. Equipped with an inbuilt stabilizer, this air conditioner also comes with a Power Chill operation feature that helps cool down the room rapidly during hot days or extreme heat conditions.

product_description: You can easily feel the relief from the sweltering summers with the Daikin 1.5 Ton Split Inverter Air Conditioner. With Daikin’s inverter technology, this air conditioner features a variety of compressor frequencies to offer enhanced cooling performance. Integrated with one-button Dew Clean technology, this air conditioner utilises condensate water to effectively and automatically clean the evaporator coil of the heat exchanger in the indoor unit. Moreover, thanks to its PM 2.5 filter, this air conditioner can effectively collect small air particles that are up to 2.5 microns in size to offer clean indoor air.

product_name: LG 1.5 Ton 5 Star Split Dual Inverter AC  - Floral White

product_description: You can enjoy a cool, comfortable climate at home with the LG AI Six-in-one Convertible Split Air Conditioner. Leveraging artificial intelligence and variable tonnage technology, it can intelligently sense the room's temperature, anticipate the appropriate cooling capacity, and modify the fan speed, temperature, and vane position. Additionally, this air conditioner also has inbuilt sensors and artificial intelligence convertible modes that analyse current conditions to provide optimal cooling. Moreover, with its horizontal and vertical four-way swing movement, this air conditioner provides consistent cooling across the space.

product_description: You can enjoy a cool and refreshing climate at home even during sultry summers with the LG ThinQ AI Convertible Split Air Conditioner. Using artificial intelligence and variable tonnage technology, it can automatically detect the room's temperature to forecast the right cooling capacity and alter the vane position, fan speed, and temperature settings. The artificial intelligence convertible modes and in-built sensors in this air conditioner analyse current conditions and sensor inputs to deliver ideal cooling. Furthermore, the cooling capacity of this air conditioner can also be easily tweaked as needed.

product_details.In The Box: 1 Indoor Unit,User Manual,Warranty Card,Remote,Copper Pipe
product_details.Installation Details:
The standard installation charges are Rs. 750. 
Standard installation of air-conditioners covers only: 
1) The installation will be done using only the items that are available inside the box. 
2) Install the AC in the pre-cut grill or a wall-space. 
3) Connection to a stabilizer or a power-point in the range of the power cord provided by the manufacturer. 
4) A test run to check the AC's cooling performance. 
5) A product demonstration. 
Not covered as part of standard installation charges are: 
1) Wiring extension from the meter to the installation site - Rs. 100 per metre. 
2) Power-point/MCB fitting and any other electrical work. 
3) Welding/grill-cutting work. 
4) A wooden frame, if required. 
5) Carpentry work, in case the window size needs to be altered. 
6) Drain pipe extension. - Rs. 100 per metre. 
7) Plumbing and masonry work. 
8) Dismantling/shifting of the old AC. - Rs. 1000-1500.

product_details.Covered in Warranty: All Parts, Excluding Air Filter, Front Grill & Plastic Parts (After Installation). Beyond the First Year of the Warranty Period,Only the Compressor Repair (Excluding Gas Filled Inside the Compressor) Will be Provided Free of Cost for 5 Years From Date of Purchase. Refrigerant Gas is Having Only One Year Warranty

Not covered as part of standard Installation charges are: 1) Outdoor unit stand - Rs. 750-1000. 2) Extra copper wire - Rs. 600-800 per metre (Two sized copper pipes will be used) 3) Drain pipe extension- Rs. 80- 110 per metre. 4) Wiring extension from the meter to the installation site - Rs. 90 per metre. 5) Vinyl tape roll -Rs. 80-110 6) Dismantling/shifting of the old AC's - Rs. 700-800 7) Closing the holes with White Cement - on Actuals 8) Stabilizer 9) Plumbing and masonry work 10) Power-point/MCB fitting and any other electrical work 11) Carpentry work. 12) Core cutting fabrication and electrical. Note: we highly recommend to use standard & authorized accessories Only. In case customer arranges accessories by his own, Brand Service Engineer might refuse &/or ask for labour charges for fixing these accessories.

product_details.Installation Details:
The standard installation charges are Rs.1599 and need to be paid directly to the service engineer. Please check the offer details to know about any installation offers that are available. 
Standard installation of air-conditioners covers only: 
1) Drilling of holes into a brick wall for taking out the pipes. 
2) Fixing a hole sleeve & cap. 
3) Fixing the indoor and outdoor unit. 
4) Connecting indoor and outdoor units using the standard Kit provided by the manufacturer (at additional cost,unless specified otherwise). 
5) Wrapping the pipe with seasoning tape. 
Not covered as part of standard Installation charges are: 
1) Outdoor unit stand - Rs. 750-1000. 
2) Extra copper wire - Rs. 600-800 per metre. 
3) Drain pipe extension,if any - Rs. 100 per metre. 
4) Wiring extension from the meter to the installation site - Rs. 100 per metre. 
5) Stabilizer,if needed,is chargeable. 
6) Plumbing and masonry work. 
7) Power-point, MCB fitting and any other electrical work. 
8) Carpentry work. 
9) Dismantling, shifting of the old AC's masonry - Rs. 1000-1500. 
10) Core cutting fabrication and electrical.

Additionally, this air conditioner has a Turbo Cool Mode that facilitates rapid cooling by boosting the fan’s RPM. Moreover, this air conditioner eliminates PM 2.5 and other contaminants from the air using a PM 2.5 filter and an HD filter.
